医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
手机数据可能无法准确代表资源不足或弱势群体手机数据越来越多地用于公共卫生管理和疾病爆发应对，正如在 COVID-19 大流行期间所证明的那样，当时位置数据被用作人类活动和接触以及知情暴露通知应用程序的代理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Mobile-phone-data-may-not-accurately-represent-under-resourced-or-vulnerable-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Mobile-phone-data-may-not-accurately-represent-under-resourced-or-vulnerable-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b529984c-594d-45f3-ba68-7fb06adfe932 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 15:38:35 -0400 Mobile phone data may not accurately represent under-resourced or vulnerable populations
多项发现为帕金森病轨迹的早期预测开辟了新途径手部颤抖和动作缓慢是帕金森病最常见的两个特征，对于许多患者来说，这是出现问题的第一个迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Multiple-discoveries-open-new-paths-for-early-prediction-of-Parkinsons-disease-trajectories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Multiple-discoveries-open-new-paths-for-early-prediction-of-Parkinsons-disease-trajectories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e531608-938c-48ab-a190-dfc93a991bb9 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 15:33:41 -0400 Multiple discoveries open new paths for early prediction of Parkinson's disease trajectories
NOSTER 与科学微生物组奖获得者阐明了共生微生物群中的“沉默鞭毛蛋白”如何逃避先天免疫Sara Clasen 因其阐明共生微生物群中的“沉默鞭毛蛋白”如何逃避宿主的先天免疫而荣获 2023 年 NOSTER 与科学微生物组奖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/NOSTER-Science-Microbiome-Prize-winner-Illuminates-how-silent-flagellins-from-commensal-microbiota-evade-innate-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/NOSTER-Science-Microbiome-Prize-winner-Illuminates-how-silent-flagellins-from-commensal-microbiota-evade-innate-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a806be4c-9161-45d0-b45d-fdbb458850a0 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 15:12:10 -0400 NOSTER & Science Microbiome Prize winner illuminates how "silent flagellins" from commensal microbiota evade innate immunity
非整倍体可以作为癌症的治疗靶点耶鲁大学的一项新研究表明，具有额外染色体的癌细胞依赖于这些染色体进行肿瘤生长，消除它们可以防止细胞形成肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Aneuploidy-could-function-as-a-therapeutic-target-for-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Aneuploidy-could-function-as-a-therapeutic-target-for-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2078aab-19d9-44fb-bcf7-666c60e990be Thu, 06 Jul 2023 15:00:44 -0400 Aneuploidy could function as a therapeutic target for cancer
睡眠-觉醒周期可能在青少年行为问题中发挥作用心理健康问题影响着全世界很大一部分儿童和青少年，其中行为问题最为普遍。青春期的行为问题可能导致行为障碍，导致不良的健康结果、残疾、生活质量下降，甚至过早死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Sleep-wake-cycle-may-play-role-in-adolescent-behavior-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Sleep-wake-cycle-may-play-role-in-adolescent-behavior-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61e418b8-1bc2-4be1-b48a-73563b685d4b Thu, 06 Jul 2023 14:52:34 -0400 Sleep-wake cycle may play role in adolescent behavior problems
研究人员发现了一种在艾滋病毒复制后期发挥关键作用的酶约翰霍普金斯大学医学院的研究人员与美国国立卫生研究院的研究人员合作，报告称，两项针对具有人源化免疫系统和人类细胞系的小鼠的新研究发现了一种在艾滋病毒复制后期发挥关键作用的酶。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Researchers-identify-an-enzyme-that-plays-a-ritic-role-in-the-late-stages-of-HIV-replication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Researchers-identify-an-enzyme-that-plays-a-ritic-role-in-the-late-stages-of-HIV-replication.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=846cb430-0164-4b8b-a35d-e73501222af5 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 14:38:04 -0400 Researchers identify an enzyme that plays a critical role in the late stages of HIV replication
研究为巴顿病的分子机制提供了见解神经元蜡质脂褐质沉积症是一组始于儿童时期的破坏性神经退行性溶酶体贮积症。 CLN3 基因突变会导致一种称为巴顿病的 NCL，其特征是视力、运动和认知进行性丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Study-provides-insights-into-the-molecular-mechanism-of-Batten-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Study-provides-insights-into-the-molecular-mechanism-of-Batten-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec2ac026-5a1a-45a8-9c59-3dd8c7b5d95c Thu, 06 Jul 2023 14:30:04 -0400 Study provides insights into the molecular mechanism of Batten disease
研究发现，有妊娠期高血压病史的黑人女性中风的风险增加 66%与白人女性相比，美国黑人女性的先兆子痫和中风的负担要高得多，但几乎所有关于这两种疾病之间关联的现有证据都来自对白人女性的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Black-women-with-history-of-hypertense-disorders-of-pregnancy-have-6625-increased-risk-of-中风-研究-发现。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Black-women-with-history-of-hypertense-disorders-of-pregnancy-have-6625-increased-risk-of-中风-研究-发现。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46ea5bac-fe9c-49c4-8b08-2c566c989d9b Thu, 06 Jul 2023 14:10:04 -0400 Black women with history of hypertensive disorders of pregnancy have 66% increased risk of stroke, study finds
COST Connect：癌症研究合作与进步的平台战胜癌症是未来几年研究和创新的重大挑战。到 2030 年，预计欧盟将有超过 150 万人死于癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/COST-Connect-A-platform-for-collaboration-and-progress-in-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/COST-Connect-A-platform-for-collaboration-and-progress-in-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99962eba-09d4-491d-b765-e82c297d8616 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 14:01:19 -0400 COST Connect: A platform for collaboration and progress in cancer research
“Médecins Solidaires”和 dRural：两个对抗医疗荒漠的创新项目在法国，有 900 万人难以获得全科医生的帮助。在全球范围内，一半人口的初级保健资源少于城市人口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Medecins-solidaires-and-dRural-Two-innovative-projects-to-fight-medical-deserts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Medecins-solidaires-and-dRural-Two-innovative-projects-to-fight-medical-deserts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05e011e0-5c5e-47fe-80a1-1e755422fd1d Thu, 06 Jul 2023 13:48:18 -0400 "Médecins solidaires" and dRural: Two innovative projects to fight medical deserts
